channel.title: Potion , wrong coding?

item.title: Potion , wrong coding?
item.dc:creator: @Bacus23 Bacus23
item.description:
@Bacus23 wrote:

when i add this code if (useItemID == 151) { if (fishPotUsed == 1) { playerLevel[10] += 1; fishPotUsed = 1; actionTimer = 60; if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("The pot wears off."); fishPotUsed = 0; } } }

above this if (useItemID == 4151 && atObjectID == 1531) { sendMessage("Works fool.");

i get no errors but when i drink the potion it doesnt raise my level…it just says nothing interesting is happenining…

I want the potion to raise my fishing level, when i drink it…

Read full topic
